div.span: Make a state called IDLE that repeats with two frames where they're both the 0th image from the Decoration image list and they both last .25 seconds; set the last frame's action to be READY. Because NONE is set as the transition, state loop indefinitely

div.font:
image Decoration 0 4
state IDLE NONE 0
frame 0 0.25 0 0 0 NONE
frame 0 0.25 0 0 0 READY
state DEATH DEAD 0
frame 1 0.166 0 0 0 NONE
frame 2 0.166 0 0 0 NONE
frame 3 0.166 0 0 0 NONE
state DEAD NONE 0
frame 4 0.25 0 0 0 NONE
frame 4 0.25 0 0 0 NONE

div.span: Alright, but how does the state machine know how to go to the DEATH state if the IDLE state loops indefinitely?

switch.text: Alright, but how does the state machine know how to...

div.span: Great question! The EFPSE checks continuouslyÂ If the decoration is above 0HP. If at any point falls below this 1hp, it will transition into the DEATH state and then, commonly in practice, transitions to the DEAD state.

switch.text: Great question! The EFPSE checks continuouslyÂ If th...
